description:
Length of time: 90 days

Location or remote: Remote

Hours/Days: Monday through Friday - 7am - 8pm EST. 40 hours a week within this timeframe.


*Need Google Workspace experience*


Interview process - Hiring Manager then Panel; language and other potential assessments

Any must haves on skill set or certifications & licenses:


*Medical Assistant certification of completion

*Excellent time management skills and ability to multitask and prioritize work

*Knowledge of medical office management systems and procedures

*Excellent written and verbal communication skills

*Internet speeds must be above 25 Mbps at home

*Must be able to comply with all work from home policies, such as having a quiet, private dedicated workspace.

*At least 1 year of experience working as a Medical Assistant in an ambulatory setting

*Must be proficient in Google Workspace; experience using Adobe, Slack, Docusign a plus.

-Provide live video virtual check in and check out support for patients

-Provide live phone and messaging support for patients.

-Provide support for your Care Team, including Virtual MDs, Advanced Practitioners and Registered Nurses

-Be proactive in planning for each patient's medical needs from initial outreach to solution

-Build trust and relationships with patients by setting clear expectations and following up with action

-Assist with the order process, including sending requisition forms, and coordinating referrals

-Close the loop with providers after referrals are made, including collecting patient notes from providers

-Schedule appointments with patients for follow up care

-Call providers and facilities to clarify information and help solve complex cases

-Coordinate with internal departments to facilitate patient care

-Coordinate with external providers and facilities to ensure patient needs are met (Laboratories, Imaging Facilities, Pharmacies, Vendors)

-Be an active participant with camera on, during team meetings, huddles and rounds

-Empower our patients to be proactive in their own healthcare

-Perform all other tasks or additional responsibilities as necessary


This is a remote role, you are able to work remotely in one of the following states:
